Package ch.hszt.connectfour.gui

Contains the presentation layer, i.e the user interface classes and customized UI objects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DropAnimation Abstract definition for any kind of drop animation
GameFrame Abstract definition of a frame providing the graphical represenstation of the game.
 

Class Summary
AppImageCanvas Customized canvas for display of application image.
BoardLabel Customized class for any label on the board in MainGameFrame.
ConnectFourAnimation Helper class for animation in connect four situation.
DropInsertionAnimation Customized animation for drop insertation
MainGameFrame Represents the frame presenting the game board allowing direct user interaction.
SetupFrame Represents the SetupFrame enabling definition of game settings and control over starting / stopping / loading / saving a game.
SlotPanel Customized panel for slot depiction on MainGameFrame
 

Package ch.hszt.connectfour.gui Description

Contains the presentation layer, i.e the user interface classes and customized UI objects.
